properties.areaDesc: New Madrid, MO; Pemiscot, MO; Lake, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 12:21PM CST until January 24 at 4:30PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Mississippi River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at Tiptonville
* from Tuesday January 14 until Thursday January 23.
* At 12 PM Sunday the stage was 35.6 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 40.0 feet on Sunday January 19.
* Flood stage is 37.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Tuesday January 14 and
continue to rise to near 40.0 feet by Sunday January 19.The river
will fall below flood stage by Thursday January 23.
* At 40.0 feet...In Tennessee, long sections of Tiptonville Ferry
Road are flooded.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Monday or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
